reviewtext: I wear  over-the-ear-stick-'em-in-your-ear hearing aids which means either I take 'em out when I want to wrap myself in music using traditional ear buds or I look for something that leaves those hearing aids where they belong and slip somthing over them.  Regular head sets were too bulky, but this beauty from Panasonic are absolutely great.  Range is good.  Volumn no problem.  Fit is adjustable.  Couldn't ask for anything better, particularly in this price range.
summary: Great sound quality at a great price
